entry.summary: Upgraded gzip to v1.14.
entry.title: Fixed: Gzip upgrade

entry.content: Fixed a kernel bug which caused some NVME disk IO errors to be ignored, potentially resulting in dropped writes.
entry.summary: Fixed NVME disk IO error bug.
entry.title: Fixed: NVME IO Error Fix

entry.content: The NFS access cache is no longer cleared on login by default. To use the old behavior, load the NFS module with the nfs_fasc=1 module parameter.
entry.summary: The NFS access cache is no longer cleared on login by default.
entry.title: Fixed: NFS access cache behavior updated

entry.summary: Fixed CVE-2024-26130 in dev-python/cryptography.
entry.title: Security: Security Update

entry.content: Upgraded sqlite to v3.50.2. This resolves CVE-2025-6965.
entry.summary: Resolved CVE-2025-6965 by upgrading sqlite to v3.50.2.
entry.title: Security: Security update: sqlite

entry.summary: Upgraded sys-libs/talloc to v2.4.3.
entry.title: Fixed: Talloc upgrade

entry.summary: Fixed KCTF-5e28d5a in the Linux kernel.
entry.title: Security: Security Update

entry.summary: fs.file-max changed from 811820 to 811775.
entry.title: Changed: Runtime sysctl change

entry.summary: COS 109 with GPU driver support
entry.title: cos-109-17800-570-5: COS 109-17800-570-5

entry.summary: This is an LTS Refresh release.
entry.title: Announcement: LTS Refresh Release

entry.content: Updated the NVIDIA GPU driver policy for New Feature Branch (NFB) drivers. The LATEST tag has been updated to point to the stable 570.133.20 Production Branch. The 575.57.08 NFB driver remains available for development and testing but must now be selected by its specific version number.
entry.summary: Updated NVIDIA GPU driver policy for NFB drivers, with the LATEST tag now pointing to the stable 570.133.20 Production Branch. The 575.57.08 NFB driver is still available for development and testing but requires explicit version selection.
entry.title: Changed: NVIDIA GPU Driver Update

entry.summary: Guest config update
entry.title: Fixed: Guest config update

entry.title: Fixed: Docker Credential Helpers Upgrade

entry.title: Fixed: jq update

entry.title: Fixed: CIFS utils upgrade

entry.title: Fixed: Fixed: libcap upgrade

entry.summary: Upgraded dev-db/sqlite to v3.50.1.
entry.title: Fixed: sqlite upgrade

entry.summary: Fixed: Unzip upgrade.
entry.title: Fixed: Unzip upgraded

entry.summary: Upgraded app-arch/gzip to v1.14.
entry.title: Fixed: gzip upgrade

entry.content: Fixed an issue where some workloads could cause a full system hang when running close to their memory limit.
entry.summary: Fixed system hang issue for memory-intensive workloads.
entry.title: Fixed: System Stability Improvement

entry.summary: Talloc v2.4.3 is now available.
entry.title: Fixed: Talloc upgrade

entry.summary: Runtime sysctl changes: fs.file-max changed from 812258 to 812234.
entry.title: Changed: Runtime sysctl changes

entry.summary: Fixed KCTF-103406b in the Linux kernel
entry.title: Security: Security update for Linux kernel

entry.title: cos-121-18867-90-97: Container-Optimized OS Update

entry.content: Updated the NVIDIA GPU driver policy for New Feature Branch (NFB) drivers. The LATEST tag has been updated to point to the stable 570.133.20 Production Branch. The 575.57.08 NFB driver remains available for development and testing but must now be selected by its specific version number. Removed 575.57.08 NFB driver support for NVIDIA_GB200 machine.
entry.summary: Updated GPU driver policy for NFB drivers. LATEST tag now points to stable 570.133.20. 575.57.08 NFB driver requires specific version selection and no longer supports NVIDIA_GB200.
entry.title: Changed: GPU Driver Policy Update

entry.content: Added ARM support for the Lustre 2.14.0 drivers.
entry.summary: ARM support for Lustre 2.14.0 drivers added.
entry.title: Feature: New ARM Support

entry.content: Fixed an issue where some workloads could cause a full system hang when running close to their memory limit.
entry.summary: Fixed system hang issue for memory-intensive workloads.
entry.title: Fixed: System Stability Improvement

entry.title: Security: Linux Kernel Security Fix

entry.summary: Runtime sysctl changes: fs.file-max changed from 811807 to 811784.
entry.title: Changed: Runtime sysctl fs.file-max change

entry.summary: This release of Container-Optimized OS (COS) features kernel version 6.6.93, Docker v24.0.9, and Containerd v1.7.27. It also includes GPU drivers, with a list of compatible versions available via a provided link.

entry.title: Security: Security update for nano text editor

entry.summary: Vim has been upgraded to version 9.1.1500, addressing multiple critical security vulnerabilities including CVE-2025-26603, CVE-2025-27423, CVE-2025-29768, CVE-2025-1215, CVE-2025-24014, and CVE-2025-22134.
entry.title: Security: Vim Security Update

entry.content: Upgraded google-guest-agent to 20250327.00. This included new services like google-guest-compat-manager.service and google-guest-agent-manager.service and new binaries like google_guest_compat_manager, gce_metadata_script_runner, google_guest_agent_manager, ggactl_plugin_cleanup and gce_compat_metadata_script_runner.
entry.summary: The google-guest-agent has been upgraded to version 20250327.00. This update introduces new services such as google-guest-compat-manager.service and google-guest-agent-manager.service, along with new binaries including google_guest_compat_manager and gce_metadata_script_runner.

entry.summary: cos-gpu-installer updated to v2.5.2, now supporting GPU driver preloading on ARM64 for OTHER/NO_GPU cases and IMEX Driver configuration for NVIDIA_GB200.
